original_text: Listen! I will use ropes to tie around you. You will not be able to turn from one side to another. You will lie on one side until you have finished all the days to attack the city.
korean_text: 내가 줄로 너를 동이리니 네가 에워싸는 날이 끝나기까지 몸을 이리 저리 돌리지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: I will use ropes to tie around you.
You will not be able to turn from one side to another.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 한쪽에서 다른 쪽으로 돌릴 수 없을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: You will lie on one side
until you have finished all the days to attack the city.
sentences.korean_translation: 성을 공격하는 모든 날을 마칠 때까지 누워 있어야 한다.
